channel.title: Mod lock or delete please
channel.description:
Hey, Can anyone tell me how I can make it so when a new player joins, they have already done all the quests. :confused: :confused: I need this because someone has made a few of the quests in-completeble.... I know that you can edit them in the character file once they have made the account, but it would be easier if they started with them done. Thanks :D
UPDATE!!!! I found out how.. Anyone who wants to know PM me. Mod lock this please. (Or Delete)
